biotools.summary: An R package designed to integrate and visualize various levels of epigenomic information, including but not limited to: ChIP, Histone, ATAC, and RNA sequencing. EpiRomics is also designed for regulatory network analysis in order to identify enhancer and enhanceosome regions from these data.

bioschemas.name: epiRomics
bioschemas.summary: An R package designed to integrate and visualize various levels of epigenomic information, including but not limited to: ChIP, Histone, ATAC, and RNA sequencing. EpiRomics is also designed for regulatory network analysis in order to identify enhancer and enhanceosome regions from these data.
